MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Kirkcowan. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have carried out network checks and have located a grounded overhead power line near Boreland Cottage. Due to the complexity of the repairs required, we now expect your supply to be restored by 2:00am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:30pm on Monday, 1st March 2021.
